markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Staff](/Traits.aspx?ID=700)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 278 <sup>2.0</sup>

This magic item holds spells of a particular theme and allows a spellcaster to cast additional spells by preparing the staff.
name: Staff
